O

org.apache.avalon.finder - package org.apache.avalon.finder
Definition of the primary finder interface that provides support for dynamic pull-bassed service activation.
org.apache.avalon.finder.ecm - package org.apache.avalon.finder.ecm
An experimentation implementation of a component that leverages dynamic service activation based on the legacy ECM product semantics.

The ECM meta-info model.
